basic.name: Lion's Fang (Q)
basic.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for 35, increased to 140 against Heroes.

basic.name: Parry (W)
basic.description: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%.Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Charge (E)
basic.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 damage and Slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

heroic.name: Taunt (R)
heroic.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.

heroic.name: Colossus Smash (R)
heroic.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 185 damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage.Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

heroic.name: Twin Blades of Fury (R)
heroic.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%.Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.

trait.name: Heroic Strike (T)
trait.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 125 bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 3 seconds.

1.name: Lion's Maw
1.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 7, up to 175.Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

1.name: Overpower
1.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 40% more damage.

1.name: High King's Quest
1.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks.Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns.Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

4.name: Taunt
4.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.

4.name: Colossus Smash
4.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 185 damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage.Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

4.name: Twin Blades of Fury
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%.Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.

7.name: Lionheart
7.description: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 75%.

7.name: Second Wind
7.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Victory Rush
7.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

10.name: Shield Wall
10.description: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

10.name: Warbringer
10.description: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

13.name: Juggernaut
13.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Mortal Strike
13.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shattering Throw
13.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 damage, and up to 1400 bonus damage to their Shields.Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus Physical Damage to Shields.

16.name: Banner of Stormwind
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.name: Banner of Ironforge
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.name: Banner of Dalaran
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

20.name: Vigilance
20.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 second.

20.name: Master at Arms
20.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy
20.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Heroic Strike damage by an additional 25%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

20.name: Glory to the Alliance
20.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

20.name: Demoralizing Shout
20.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.
